oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter to Bryan M. Eagle from Virginia Fleming
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Eagle, Bryan M.; correspondence; Fleming, Virginia;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Handwritten love letter from Virginia Fleming of 16 Morningside Park, Memphis, Tennessee, to Bryan Eagle of Little Rock, Arkansas. Postmarked October 27, 1924.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Virginia Fleming
